message: Let's start fair. I propose we split the money 60/40, with me getting the bigger share since I made the first offer. What do you think?
I think a 55/45 split is fairer, considering the inflation will affect your share more than mine.
Let's be reasonable.  Inflation is hitting us both, so a 50/50 split seems the fairest way to go now.  It's a fresh start, and we can both get something out of this deal.
